titleStmt.title: Bradshaws ultimum vale, being the last words that are ever intended to be spoke of him. As they were delivered in a sermon preach'd at his interrment. By J.O. D.D. time-server general of England.
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1616-1683, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: "J.O." is apparently intended to represent John Owen.
The imprint is false; actually printed in London (Madan).
Annotation on Thomason copy: "xber [i.e. December] 30. 1659"; the date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
